name: eneyj
description: A functional language based on JSON objects.

scripts.build: node node_modules/standard/bin/cmd.js src/*.js src/**/*.js src/**/**/*.js --fix && node src/scripts/formatData.js
scripts.test: node node_modules/standard/bin/cmd.js src/*.js src/**/*.js src/**/**/*.js --fix && node src/scripts/formatData.js && node src/scripts/labelMap.js && node src/test/test.js
scripts.pullfromwiki: php ../../../maintenance/dumpBackup.php --current --filter=namespace:78 > data/backup.xml && node src/scripts/pullFromBackup.js && rm data/backup.xml

author: Denny Vrandečić
